page.title: 04RUGBY SCHOOL
page.content: RUGBY SCHOOL COVERS A MAJORITY OF LAND IN THE CENTRE AND SOUTH-EAST OF THE TOWN.IT'S CLASSROOMS,SCHOOL HOUSES AND DORMITORIES OR STUDIES COVER THR TOWN CENTRE WHILE IT'S SPORTS FIELDS COVER THE SOUTH-EAST.THE PUPILS AGED 13 TO 19 COME FROM ALL OVER THE WORLD. ONLY A HANDFULL ACTUALLY COME FROM RUGBY.IT TAKES BOYS ONLY UNTIL THE SIXTH FORM WHERE IT TAKES IN GIRLS AS WELL.RUGBY SCHOOL ALSO OWNS THE TEMPLE SPEECH ROOMS ON THE CORNER OF BARBY ROAD AND HILLMORTON ROAD.IT HAS A LARGE DOME INTO WHICH,INSIDE,THE STAGE EXTENDS.RUGBY SCHOOL HAS STOPPED HOUSES BEING BUILT ON THEIR LAND.WILLIAM WEBB ELLIS,AN EX-PUPIL OF RUGBY SCHOOL MADE UP THE GAME,RUGBY FOOTBALL,BY PICKING UP THE BALL AND RUNNING WITH IT WHILST PLAYING FOOTBALL.
